ai_data_engineering.title: Building Agents With Snowflake Cortex AI at Every Level
ai_data_engineering.summary: Organizations care about tech optionality — not just to avoid vendor lock-in, but also to make sure they’re using the best tool for the job. This particularly applies to AI agents. The more tools and systems at an agent’s disposal, the better the agent. Dataiku has always aimed to put these tools in the hands of a diverse range of users, which is why we’re excited to provide no-code UIs to build AI agents leveraging the entire Snowflake Cortex AI stack in conjunction with the release of Snowflake Intelligence.

ai_data_engineering.title: The Modern Analyst’s Simplified Path From Question to Insight
ai_data_engineering.summary: It’s Monday morning, marketing just asked a seemingly simple question: “Which suppliers are driving the most customer complaints, and are there any patterns?”

data_modeling_governance.title: Scaling data governance with Amazon DataZone: Covestro success story
data_modeling_governance.summary: In this post, we show you how Covestro transformed its data architecture by implementing Amazon DataZone and AWS Serverless Data Lake Framework, transitioning from a centralized data lake to a data mesh architecture. The implementation enabled streamlined data access, better data quality, and stronger governance at scale, achieving a 70% reduction in time-to-market for over 1,000 data pipelines.

lake_storage_formats.title: I spent 8 hours understanding how Parquet actually stores the data.
lake_storage_formats.summary: From logical data representation to data encoding and compression.
